attributes.additional_details: Create a new party and let the public control it
attributes.background: We want a new political party made up of people from the public, the current party’s no one wants to vote for because we don’t agree with any of them

rejection.details:
We can only accept petitions about things the Government or Parliament are directly responsible for.

The UK Government and Parliament are not responsible for creating new political parties. This is a matter for individuals wishing to form a new political party.
